title: PVP.net patcher help
body:
So when i try to run the launcher i get PVP.net Patcher kernel has stopped working
Check online for a solution
Close the program
Debug the program.

Then i look in the problem details this is what i get
Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:	APPCRASH
  Application Name:	rads_user_kernel.exe
  Application Version:	0.0.0.0
  Application Timestamp:	4e65c1ac
  Fault Module Name:	MSVCR80.dll
  Fault Module Version:	8.0.50727.8428
  Fault Module Timestamp:	520b1060
  Exception Code:	c0000005
  Exception Offset:	00012f4b
  OS Version:	6.3.9600.2.0.0.256.48
  Locale ID:	3081
  Additional Information 1:	5861
  Additional Information 2:	5861822e1919d7c014bbb064c64908b2
  Additional Information 3:	a10f
  Additional Information 4:	a10ff7d2bb2516fdc753f9c34fc3b069

Can anyone help?

replies.body:
Window's dialogue for application crashes only has data useful for Windows developer, that is, it's not useful for helping you detect exactly what happened with League. A better resource would be the logs produced by the "RADS" application, which is the first one that starts up when you attempt to launch League.

But first thing first, have you tried running the application in admin mode? (Right-click the icon, "Run as Administrator...")

No worries.

Best of luck in the field of pie!
